PC_SCROLL_WRITING_SQ505_VOLKERNOTE_V5_A_: We'll get back to you tomorrow with more slander and libel!
PC_SCROLL_WRITING_SQ505_VOLKERNOTE_V4_B_: Volker spits on the pushovers of the Guard and the Merchant's Guild...
PC_SCROLL_WRITING_SQ505_VOLKERNOTE_V4_A_: forget the Guard and the Merchant's Guild...
PC_SCROLL_WRITING_SQ505_VOLKERNOTE_V3_B_: we'll take everyone, but only a few will get paid...
PC_SCROLL_WRITING_SQ505_VOLKERNOTE_V3_A_: no one is useless to us, you will be great cannon fodder...
PC_SCROLL_WRITING_SQ505_VOLKERNOTE_V2_B_: we're offering you the opportunity to join the murderers in Volker's service...
PC_SCROLL_WRITING_SQ505_VOLKERNOTE_V2_A_: we want to offer you exploitation and torment...
